task.title: How to Edit a Packed Publishing Template

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

context.p: To edit an existing Oxygen Publishing Template package, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Unzip the ZIP archive associated with the Oxygen Publishing Template in a separate folder.
Link the folder associated with the template in the ProjectNavigator view.
Using the ProjectNavigator view, you can modify the resources (CSS, JS, fonts) within the Oxygen Publishing Template folder to fit your needs.
Open the publishing template descriptor file (.opt extension) in the editor and modify to suit your needs.
Once you finish your customization, you can archive the folder as a ZIP file.
